ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Newbie bard race to 12
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve been doing this too, though my skill s only in the 20s.  Heh, what s funny is I also do this with my cleric.  In an RP sense, she s wants to be a
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Elijah Meeker [mailto:emeeker@...]

> Oh, one thing I forgot. I have been dumping training points
> into Bind Wound
> since the start and am really happy I did. At 60 or so it
> heals up to 15
> over (I think) 3 ticks and really makes the first half of bad
> hurtin heal
> quickly.

I've been doing this too, though my skill's only in the 20s. Heh, what's
funny is I also do this with my cleric. In an RP sense, she's wants to be a
master of all forms of healing. In an OOC sense, if there aren't any
wandering mobs and if I can save a bit of mana & reduce a bit of down time,
why not bandage? Freaks people out though the first time she slaps guaze on
them. ;^)

Peace
Evulia, twink of twelve tunes, Tunare
